description: Displays details about a control panel.

parameters.name: ControlPanelArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control panel.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster that includes the control panel.

nested_items.name: ControlPanelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the control panel.

nested_items.name: DefaultControlPanel
nested_items.description: A flag that Amazon Route 53 Application Recovery Controller sets to true to designate the default control panel for a cluster. When you create a cluster, Amazon Route 53 Application Recovery Controller creates a control panel, and sets this flag for that control panel. If you create a control panel yourself, this flag is set to false.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the control panel. You can use any non-white space character in the name.

nested_items.name: RoutingControlCount
nested_items.description: The number of routing controls in the control panel.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The deployment status of control panel. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the control panel owner.
